name: Voodoo Mask
description: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.

abilities.name: Magic Lifesteal
abilities.description: Restores the wielder's health for a portion of damage dealt by magical and physical spell damage.
notes: Only works with magical and physical spell damage
Does not work with attack damage or any pure damage
Does not work with damage with the HP Removal or the no-reflection flags
Stacks additively with other spell lifesteal sources
Does not work on Allied units, Illusions, Buildings, Ward-type units, or Couriers
The lifesteal value is reduced by a factor of 0.2 against creeps
All ability effects are visible on illusions for camouflaging purposes

additionalInfo: Multiple instances of spell lifesteal from the same source do not stack
Spell lifesteal from different sources stacks additively
